venue.name: Microsoft NERD New England Research & Development Center

item.description:
Come hang out with Biotech individuals from all over the world as the BIO Convention rolls into Boston from June 18-21 at one of the largest events going on during the after hours of the convention with over 1200 individuals from throughout the industry.

This event offers a special night of networking, video games, dancing, one-on-one innovation pitches, and spectacular views of Boston. The innovation pitches offer companies an opportunity to profile cutting-edge products that cross the intersection between biotech and tech.

http://www.biofete.com/

MUST RSVP ON WEBSITE ATTACHED FOR THE EVENT
item.name: BIO Convention - Biofete!
